run

public boolean run(SPF1Data spfData)
            throws PermErrorException,
                   TempErrorException
Description copied from interface: Mechanism
Run the mechanismn with the give SPF1Data

Parameters:
spfData - The SPF1Data
Returns:
true if the mechanism match. Otherwise false
Throws:
PermErrorException - Get thrown if there are any errors in modifiers
TempErrorException - Get thrown if DNS problems detected
See Also:
